exception.title: Multiple constraints detected for single component.
Graphical editing is not provided for Action classes.
exception.pre: Please use the Source page to make any changes. Actions can be graphically added to the JToolBar and JMenu.

exceptions.exception: line {0}: You are attempting to set the layout {3} for the Container {1}. However, the Container already has the layout {2}. Please remove the invalid setLayout() invocation from your source.
